1 small pear, to decorate

,

1 sheet of edible gold leaf

]

title: Walnut & Stilton Soda Bread
ingredients:
[

200g Stilton

,

150g walnut pieces

,

100g sultanas

,

600g plain white flour

,

400g plain wholemeal flour, plus extra for dusting

,

2 tsp bicarbonate of soda

,

2 tsp salt

,

about 800ml buttermilk

]

title: Zingy Citrus Madeira Cake
ingredients:
[
For the cake mixture:
,

150g unsalted butter, softened

,

150g caster sugar

,

4 medium eggs, at room temperature, beaten to mix

,

200g self-raising flour

,

pinch of salt

,

finely grated zest of 2 medium oranges

,

finely grated zest of 1 large unwaxed lemon

]
